<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Stop Serverless Function Scan</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v31.02/serverless/stop"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"monitorServerless","saas":true,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



Stops the ongoing serverless scan.

### cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL command:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -X POST \
  https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/serverless/stop
```
